long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See unbiased summarized product reviews on Amazon using GPT3. Go to any Amazon product page and press the search button on the extension. We will synthesize all the product reviews and generate an unbiased list of strengths and weaknesses of the product based on consumer feedback. This product will only work on Amazon product detail page (the Amazon Standard Identification Number must be in the url when you press the search button).

See the loom video for the extension in action! https://www.loom.com/share/7eb78338d4674ae18c7ad561aee2966d
